scripts.all: npm ci && npm run get-all-submodules && npm run cleanup && npm run compile-posdao-contracts && npm run make-spec && npm run start-test-setup && npm run test && npm run stop-test-setup
scripts.all-light: npm run cleanup && npm run make-spec && npm run start-test-setup && npm run test && npm run stop-test-setup
scripts.cleanup: bash scripts/stop-test-setup && rm -rf ./build ./parity-data ./accounts && git checkout ./parity-data && git checkout ./accounts
scripts.compile-posdao-contracts: cd ./posdao-contracts && npm ci && npm run compile
scripts.make-spec: . ./scripts/network-spec && cd ./posdao-contracts && npm ci && node ./scripts/make_spec.js && cd - && node ./scripts/copy-spec.js
scripts.start-test-setup: bash scripts/start-test-setup ../parity-ethereum/target/release/parity && (node scripts/watchOrdinaryNode.js &) && node scripts/deploy-staking-token.js && (node scripts/watchRandomSeed &)
scripts.test-upgrade: npm ci && npm run get-all-submodules && npm run cleanup && npm run compile-posdao-contracts && npm run upgrade-make-initial-spec && npm run upgrade-start-test-setup && npm run upgrade-prepare-fork && npm run upgrade-restart-test-setup && npm run upgrade-watcher
scripts.test-upgrade-light: npm run cleanup && npm run upgrade-make-initial-spec && npm run upgrade-start-test-setup && npm run upgrade-prepare-fork && npm run upgrade-restart-test-setup && npm run upgrade-watcher
scripts.upgrade-prepare-fork: . ./scripts/network-spec && cd ./posdao-contracts && node ./scripts/deploy_contracts_and_update_spec.js && cd - && npm run stop-test-setup && node ./scripts/copy-spec.js
